articles.description: Lionel Messi will try to win the World Cup with Argentina at the fifth attempt when this year's tournament kicks off in Qatar on November 20, with the final on December 18
articles.content:
Argentina captain Lionel Messi is most concerned about Brazil and France ruining his World Cup dream in Qatar - not England.
